After the Archon War, I was actually one of the first people to start a polity there! The first Liyue Qixing needed support after the war, and so I took matters into my own hands by being their secretary. That's how I got my Vision, as well.

As you can see from my... horns, I'm a Qilin. {focused} Well, specifically half-Qilin.{!reset} It roughly translates to 'Illuminated Beasts'... and it means we were blessed to manipulate the elements by the Geo Archon, Morax.
